articles.author: Ella Joyner
articles.title: Tariff troubles overshadow US olive branch at NATO - DW
articles.description: US Secretary of State Rubio was more conciliatory in tone with NATO allies, but the growing transatlantic chasm is hard to gloss over. Ukraine's future and European security are existential questions for the alliance.
articles.content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio arrived with a message of reassurance and firm instructions for skittish NATO foreign ministers as they assembled at alliance headquarters in Brussels on Thursday: W… [+6034 chars]
